content.question: The nganga drives a nail or pointed object into a Nkisi n'kondi figure in order to

choices.label: initiate young girls into a secret society
record and remember the history of the community
activate the spiritual power inside the figure
protect the sacred relics of ancestors

content.answer: activate the spiritual power inside the figure

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
